job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As the Lead AI/ML Engineer at Caide, you will be at the forefront of our AI activities, driving the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions within our flagship product. This role encompasses a broad range of responsibilities, from chatbot creation to training and hosting large language models. You will ensure our infrastructure is scalable, efficient, and secure, supporting the seamless integration of AI and ML components into our product offerings. Additionally, you will address the complex needs of integrating LLMs, ensuring a seamless and effective deployment. Your work will be pivotal in enhancing the capabilities of our sales automation tool, making it smarter, faster, and more reliable.

   Your role
     * Lead the development and integration of AI and ML technologies within our flagship product, ensuring technical excellence and innovation.
     * Design and implement scalable machine learning models and LLM solutions, focusing on optimising performance and user experience.
     * Oversee the entire AI lifecycle, including data collection, model training, evaluation, and deployment of our LLMs.
     * Ensure the infrastructure supporting AI and ML operations is robust, secure, and capable of scaling with the company's growth.
     * Incorporate REST API capabilities for model exposure, enhancing the accessibility and integration potential of our AI solutions.
     * Stay abreast of the latest AI/ML advancements and incorporate cutting-edge technologies to maintain our competitive edge.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Lead AI Engineer

As the Lead AI/ML Engineer at Caide, you will be at the forefront of our AI activities, driving the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions within our flagship product. This role encompasses a broad range of responsibilities, from chatbot creation to training and hosting large language models. You will ensure our infrastructure is scalable, efficient, and secure, supporting the seamless integration of AI and ML components into our product offerings. Additionally, you will address the complex needs of integrating LLMs, ensuring a seamless and effective deployment. Your work will be pivotal in enhancing the capabilities of our sales automation tool, making it smarter, faster, and more reliable.

   Your role
     * Lead the development and integration of AI and ML technologies within our flagship product, ensuring technical excellence and innovation.
     * Design and implement scalable machine learning models and LLM solutions, focusing on optimising performance and user experience.
     * Oversee the entire AI lifecycle, including data collection, model training, evaluation, and deployment of our LLMs.
     * Ensure the infrastructure supporting AI and ML operations is robust, secure, and capable of scaling with the company's growth.
     * Incorporate REST API capabilities for model exposure, enhancing the accessibility and integration potential of our AI solutions.
     * Stay abreast of the latest AI/ML advancements and incorporate cutting-edge technologies to maintain our competitive edge.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of LLMs and AI-driven solutions, including chatbot creation and hosting large language models. It specifically mentions integrating LLMs, designing scalable LLM solutions, and overseeing the AI lifecycle for LLMs, which are core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While ML Engineer responsibilities like model training and evaluation are present, the focus on generative models and their application in user-facing product enhancements aligns more closely with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'training and hosting large language models', 'design and implement scalable machine learning models and LLM solutions', and 'model training, evaluation, and deployment of our LLMs'. This directly relates to the core process of creating and adapting models.
job_tasks.phrase: training and hosting large language models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design and implement scalable machine learning models and LLM solutions' indicates the creation and adaptation of models.
job_tasks.phrase: design and implement scalable machine learning models and LLM solutions

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Oversee the entire AI lifecycle, including data collection, model training, evaluation, and deployment of our LLMs.' This covers the entire modeling process.
job_tasks.phrase: Oversee the entire AI lifecycle, including data collection, model training, evaluation, and deployment of our LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Incorporate REST API capabilities for model exposure' and 'integration of AI and ML components into our product offerings' points to traditional software development tasks for exposing and integrating AI features.
job_tasks.phrase: Incorporate REST API capabilities for model exposure

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integration of AI and ML technologies within our flagship product' implies building and integrating AI into a larger software system.
job_tasks.phrase: integration of AI and ML technologies within our flagship product

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'ensure our infrastructure is scalable, efficient, and secure, supporting the seamless integration of AI and ML components' and 'Ensure the infrastructure supporting AI and ML operations is robust, secure, and capable of scaling' directly relates to managing and scaling the operational aspects of AI/ML systems.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure our infrastructure is scalable, efficient, and secure

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'supporting the seamless integration of AI and ML components into our product offerings' implies the operational aspect of making AI/ML work within a product.
job_tasks.phrase: supporting the seamless integration of AI and ML components into our product offerings

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions' clearly indicates understanding business context and requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions

soft_skills.phrase: Stay abreast of the latest AI/ML advancements and incorporate cutting-edge technologies
Lead the development and integration of AI and ML technologies
